q: because of a national holiday monday, this was the first chance for investors in japan to react to a raft of emergency measures by governments around the world to thaw frozen credit markets and bolster funding to banks. investors were relieved by government moves to rescue the global financial system, said Kazuhiro Takahashi , general manager at daiwa securities smbc. Robin Smith , chairwoman of the tennessee republican party, said it's hard to say whether the economy will influence any candidate's decision to get in- or out- of the race. if you're committed to serve your state, i think that commitment will probably linger throughout the whole time regardless of the circumstances, she said. gray sasser, the outgoing chairman of the tennessee democratic party, said the next governor must be prepared to manage the state in a tough time, as Phil Bredesen has been forced to do.
